translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Lúcio Antônio de Santa Ana, soldier of the 3rd Battalion of Hunters, who fell ill at the estate of Padre Feliciano, when this battalion was marching to join the forces coming from Rio Grande, was taken prisoner on the 25th of last November, when the rebel force led by Agostinho was defeated; and, as I was informed of these circumstances, I took him from among the prisoners to deliver him to the battalion; and now I present him to Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency  
Camp at Restinga Seca, December 8, 1841.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Antônio Correia Seara.  
Brigadier Interim Commander of the Forces in Operations.  
Francisco Manuel Accioli.  
Captain Interim Commander.
